original_text: Then Sennacherib's men shouted loudly to the people who were standing on Jerusalem's walls. They spoke in the language of Judah's people. They wanted to make the people very afraid so that they could take the city for themselves.
korean_text: 산헤립의 신하가 유다 방언으로 크게 소리 질러 예루살렘 성 위에 있는 백성을 놀라게 하고 괴롭게 하여 그 성을 점령하려 하였는데

sentences.korean_translation: 그때 산헤립의 사람들이 큰 소리로 외쳤다

sentences.original_text: to the people who were standing on Jerusalem's walls
They spoke in the language of Judah's people
They wanted to make the people very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 백성들을 매우 두렵게 만들려고 했다

sentences.original_text: so that they could take the city for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그 도시를 자신들을 위해 차지할 수 있었다
